00014 #ifndef ULIB_UXML2DOCUMENT_H
00015 #define ULIB_UXML2DOCUMENT_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/xml/libxml2/node.h>
00018 
00019 /*
00020 Represents an XML document in the DOM model.
00021 
00022 struct _xmlDoc {
00023         void*                                   _private;       // application data
00024         xmlElementType          type;       // XML_DOCUMENT_NODE, must be second !
00025         char*                                   name;                   // name/filename/URI of the document
00026         struct _xmlNode*        children;   // the document tree
00027         struct _xmlNode*        last;                   // last child link
00028         struct _xmlNode*        parent;         // child->parent link
00029         struct _xmlNode*        next;                   // next sibling link
00030         struct _xmlNode*        prev;                   // previous sibling link
00031         struct _xmlDoc* doc;                    // autoreference to itself
00032         // End of common part
00033         int compression;                                        // level of zlib compression
00034         int standalone;                                 // standalone document (no external refs)
00035                                                                                         //  1 if standalone = "yes"
00036                                                                                         //  0 if standalone = "no"
00037                                                                                         // -1 if there is no XML declaration
00038                                                                                         // -2 if there is an XML declaration, but no standalone attribute was specified
00039         struct _xmlDtd* intSubset;  // the document internal subset
00040         struct _xmlDtd* extSubset;  // the document external subset
00041         struct _xmlNs*          oldNs;          // Global namespace, the old way
00042         const xmlChar*          version;                // the XML version string
00043         const xmlChar*          encoding;   // external initial encoding, if any
00044         void*                                   ids;        // Hash table for ID attributes if any
00045         void*                                   refs;       // Hash table for IDREFs attributes if any
00046         const xmlChar*          URL;                    // The URI for that document
00047         int charset;                                            // encoding of the in-memory content actually an xmlCharEncoding
00048         struct _xmlDict*        dict;                   // dict used to allocate names or NULL
00049         void*                                   psvi;                   // for type/PSVI informations
00050         int parseFlags;                                 // set of xmlParserOption used to parse the document
00051         int properties;                                 // set of xmlDocProperties for this document set at the end of parsing
00052 };
00053 */
00054 
00055 class U_EXPORT UXML2Document {
00056 public:
00057 
00058         // Check for memory error
00059         U_MEMORY_TEST
00060 
00061         // Allocator e Deallocator
00062         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00063         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00064 
00065         // Costruttori
00066 
00067         UXML2Document()
00068                 {
00069                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Document, "", 0)
00070 
00071                 impl_ = (xmlDocPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewDoc, "%S", (xmlChar*)"1.0");
00072                 }
00073 
00074         UXML2Document(const UString& data);
00075 
00076         ~UXML2Document()
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Document)
00079 
00080                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlFreeDoc, "%p", impl_);
00081                 }
00082 
00086         const char* getEncoding() const { return (const char*)impl_->encoding; }
00087 
00088         xmlDtdPtr getInternalSubset() const
00089                 {
00090                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::getInternalSubset()")
00091 
00092                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00093 
00094                 xmlDtdPtr dtd = (xmlDtdPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlGetIntSubset, "%p", impl_);
00095 
00096                 U_RETURN_POINTER(dtd,_xmlDtd);
00097                 }
00098 
00099         xmlDtdPtr setInternalSubset(const char* name, const char* external_id = 0, const char* system_id = 0)
00100                 {
00101                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::setInternalSubset(%S,%S,%S)", name, external_id, system_id)
00102 
00103                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00104 
00105                 xmlDtdPtr dtd = (xmlDtdPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlCreateIntSubset, "%p,%S,%S,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)name,
00106                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)external_id,
00107                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)system_id);
00108 
00109                 U_RETURN_POINTER(dtd,_xmlDtd);
00110                 }
00111 
00119         xmlNodePtr getRootNode() const
00120                 {
00121                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::getRootNode()")
00122 
00123                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00124 
00125                 xmlNodePtr root = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlDocGetRootElement, "%p", impl_);
00126 
00127                 U_RETURN_POINTER(root,_xmlNode);
00128                 }
00129 
00140         xmlNodePtr createRootNode(const char* name, const char* ns_uri = 0, const char* ns_prefix = 0)
00141                 {
00142                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::setInternalSubset(%S,%S,%S)", name, ns_uri, ns_prefix)
00143 
00144                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00145 
00146                 xmlNodePtr node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewDocNode, "%p,%p,%S,%S", impl_, 0, (const xmlChar*)name, 0);
00147 
00148                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlDocSetRootElement, "%p,%p", impl_, node);
00149 
00150                 xmlNodePtr root = getRootNode();
00151 
00152                 if (ns_uri) UXML2Node(root).setNameSpaceDeclaration(ns_uri, ns_prefix);
00153 
00154                 U_RETURN_POINTER(root,_xmlNode);
00155                 }
00156 
00165         xmlNodePtr createRootNodeByImport(const xmlNodePtr node, bool recursive = true)
00166                 {
00167                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::createRootNodeByImport(%p,%b)", node, recursive)
00168 
00169                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00170 
00171                 xmlNodePtr imported_node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlDocCopyNode, "%p,%p,%b", node, impl_, recursive);
00172 
00173                 if (imported_node) U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlDocSetRootElement, "%p,%p", impl_, node);
00174 
00175                 xmlNodePtr root = getRootNode();
00176 
00177                 U_RETURN_POINTER(root,_xmlNode);
00178                 }
00179 
00187         xmlNodePtr addComment(const char* content)
00188                 {
00189                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::addComment(%S)", content)
00190 
00191                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00192                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00193 
00194                 xmlNodePtr node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewComment, "%S", (const xmlChar*)content);
00195 
00196                 // Use the result, because node can be freed when merging text nodes:
00197 
00198                 if (node) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddChild, "%p,%p", (xmlNodePtr)impl_, node);
00199 
00200                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00201                 }
00202 
00212         xmlEntityPtr setEntityDeclaration(const char* name, xmlEntityType type, const char* publicId, const char* systemId, const char* content)
00213                 {
00214                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::setEntityDeclaration(%S,%d,%S,%S,%S)", name, type, publicId, systemId, content)
00215 
00216                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00217 
00218                 xmlEntityPtr entity = (xmlEntityPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddDocEntity, "%p,%S,%d,%S,%S,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)name, type,
00219                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)publicId,
00220                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)systemId,
00221                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)content);
00222 
00223                 U_RETURN_POINTER(entity,_xmlEntity);
00224                 }

00235         xmlNodePtr findNode(const xmlNodePtr parent, const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns);

00245         bool writeToFile(const char* filename, const char* encoding = 0, bool formatted = false);
00246 
00256         xmlChar* writeToString(int& length, const char* encoding = 0, bool formatted = false);
00257 
00267         UString xmlC14N(int mode = 0, int with_comments = 0, unsigned char** inclusive_namespaces = 0);
00268 
00269         // Access the underlying libxml2 implementation.
00270 
00271         xmlDocPtr cobj() { return impl_; }
00272 
00273 #ifdef DEBUG
00274         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00275 #endif

00278         xmlDocPtr impl_;
00279 
00280         static bool binit;
00281 
00282         static void init();
00283 
00284         UXML2Document(xmlDocPtr doc) : impl_(doc)
00285                 {
00286                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Document, "%p", doc)
00287                 }
00288 
00298         xmlEntityPtr getEntity(const char* name)
00299                 {
00300                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::getEntity(%S)", name)
00301 
00302                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00303 
00304                 xmlEntityPtr node = (xmlEntityPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlGetDocEntity, "%p,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)name);
00305 
00306                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlEntity);
00307                 }
00308

00310         UXML2Document(const UXML2Document&)            {}
00311         UXML2Document& operator=(const UXML2Document&) { return *this; }
00312 };
